name: Cat city
description:
"Cat city" is an exciting hidden objects game. In this game, you will have to explore the whole city to find all the cats (and various secrets) and get closer to the goal of making this world and the lives of the cats living in it a little better, and restore their faith in people!



The main character will help you figure it out and get comfortable, and tell you about the necessary help in this exciting and extremely important matter! The help of each person is important so that the world becomes better, and faith in humanity has been restored!

Key features of the mission:
- Busy city to search for cats;
- 7 different buildings in the city, each one with 3 rooms;
- The story is rich in secrets that can be found in the game world;
- The ability to easily get a hint, as well as zoom in using a magnifying glass.
